to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In the next place, the university students should also display main function in the course of relationship adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 首先要發揮高校政工幹部在調適關係中的主導性作用。

sentences.english: Neotectonics was the dominant factor of the environmental evolution of Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 新構造運動是黃土高原區域環境變遷的主導性因素。

sentences.english: For this dominating influence of conservative patterns of thought various factors were responsible.
sentences.chinese: 各種因素造成了保守思想模式的主導性影響。

sentences.english: Also, you often depict dominant female characters.
sentences.chinese: 而且你經常塑造主導性的女性角色。
